naslov: GOTOVA KUĆA VISOKI ROH BAU CENTAR PREKO ! (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJEMO GOTOVU IZGRAĐENU KUĆU U VISOKOM ROH BAU PREKO CENTAR - OTOK UGLJAN Prodajemo gotovu izgrađenu kuću u visokom roh bau u centru Preka u staroj jezgri ukupne netto korisne kvadrature 114,55 m2 koja se nalazi na parceli ukupne površine 342 m2. Kuća se po projektu trenutno sastoji od 3 sobe sa kupaonom,praonom,wc-om,te dnevnim boravkom i kuhinjom. Kuća ima uredni pristupni put te previdena parkirna mjesta. Kuća se nalazi u predivnoj staroj jezgri koja odiše tradicionalnim notama te mirom prikladnim za obiteljski život ili turizam te je udaljena od užeg centra i plaže svega par minuta hoda. Završetak radova predviđen je za kraj prosinca ove godine. Kuća se prodaje ne namještena. Dokumentacija uredna,građevinska te vlasništvo uredno 1/1.Uporabna dozvola pri završetku radova po projektu ! Za sve detaljne informacije molimo da nazovete na dolje navedeni broj. KONTAKT TELEFON : +385 91 93 43 658 Molimo direktne kupce bez agencija ! Razgledavanje moguće uz prethodnu najavu. ENG ________________________________________ WE ARE SELLING A COMPLETED HOUSE IN HIGH ROH BAU STATE IN THE CENTER OF PREKO - ISLAND OF UGLJAN We are selling a completed house in the center of Preko, in the old town core, in a HIGH ROH BAU state, with a total net usable area of 114.55 m², located on a plot of 342 m². According to the project, the house currently consists of 3 rooms, a bathroom, laundry, toilet, as well as a living room and kitchen. The house has a proper access road and planned parking spaces. The house is located in a beautiful old town core, full of traditional charm and peacefulness, suitable for family living or tourism, just a few minutes' walk from the town center and beach. The completion of the work is planned for the end of December this year. NOTE: THE HOUSE IS SOLD IN THE COMPLETED HIGH ROH BAU STATE BASED ON 2D PLANS ATTACHED IN THE PHOTOS, NOT IN THE CONDITION SHOWN IN THE PHOTOS, AS THE CONSTRUCTION IS STILL IN PROGRESS! THE PHOTOS WILL BE UPDATED ACCORDING TO THE PROGRESS OF THE BUILDING! THEREFORE, THE PRICE REFERS TO A FINISHED HOUSE IN ROH BAU CONDITION! The documentation is in order, with building permits, and ownership is clear 1/1. The occupancy permit will be obtained upon the completion of the work according to the project. CONTACT PHONE: +385 91 93 43 658 Please, only direct buyers, no agencies! Viewing is possible with prior notice.
